sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ de Zhōngwén jìnbù hěn dà.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ton chinois a beaucoup progressé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Your Chinese has improved a lot.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他遇到了一场车祸意外。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yùdào le yī chǎng chēhuò yìwài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a eu un accident de voiture.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He had a car accident.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 请在前台登记您的信息。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng zài qiántái dēngjì nín de xìnxī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez enregistrer vos informations à la réception.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please register your information at the front desk.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yīshēng jiànyì tā jièyān.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le médecin lui a conseillé d'arrêter de fumer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The doctor advised him to quit smoking.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Běijīng kǎoyā fēicháng yǒumíng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le canard laqué de Pékin est très célèbre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Beijing roast duck is very famous.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 预防疾病比治疗更重要。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Yùfáng jíbìng bǐ zhìliáo gèng zhòngyào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Prévenir les maladies est plus important que les guérir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Preventing diseases is more important than treating them.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen qù jīchǎng yíngjiē tā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Nous allons à l'aéroport pour l'accueillir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We are going to the airport to welcome him.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège bōlibēi shì tòumíng de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce verre est transparent.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This glass is transparent.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zāogāo, wǒ wàng le dài yàoshi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Zut, j'ai oublié mes clés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Oh no, I forgot to bring my keys.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 暴雨造成了严重的洪水。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bàoyǔ zàochéng le yánzhòng de hóngshuǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Les fortes pluies ont causé de graves inondations.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Heavy rain caused serious flooding.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他资助了很多贫困学生。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zīzhù le hěn duō pínkùn xuéshēng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a financé de nombreux étudiants pauvres.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He sponsored many poor students.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tái diànnǎo yǒudiǎn máobìng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cet ordinateur a quelques problèmes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This computer has some problems.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这辆卡车能装五吨货物。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè liàng kǎchē néng zhuāng wǔ dūn huòwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce camion peut transporter cinq tonnes de marchandises.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This truck can carry five tons of goods.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī gè hěn yōumò de rén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: C'est une personne très drôle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a very humorous person.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhànzhēng pòhuài le hěn duō jiànzhù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La guerre a détruit beaucoup de bâtiments.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The war destroyed many buildings.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng dàshēng niàn zhè piān kèwén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez lire ce texte à haute voix.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please read this text aloud.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bùyào qīngshì rènhé rén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne sous-estime personne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't look down on anyone.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 妈妈牵着孩子的手过马路。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Māma qiānzhe háizi de shǒu guò mǎlù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La mère tient la main de l'enfant pour traverser la rue.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The mother holds the child's hand to cross the street.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Hā, nǐ shuō de zhēn yǒuqù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ha, ce que tu dis est vraiment intéressant.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Ha, what you said is really interesting.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shì zhōngxīn yǒu hěn duō shāngchǎng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de centres commerciaux au centre-ville.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many shopping malls in the city center.
